metadata.inclusion:
1. Pull out the battery insulator
2. The LED will flash for 30 seconds while the PIR warms up
3. After the LED turns off, press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. Press and release the Tamper Switch once after inclusion
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The device will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Function Button for 12 seconds.
